details.overview: The challenge was to design a responsive and fast-loading website that effectively showcases the developer's work.
details.objectives: Create an online presence that communicates technical expertise, attracts potential employers, and provides a platform to display projects.
details.challenge: Creating a design that is both simple and effective in communicating technical expertise.
details.outcome: Boosted engagement and positive feedback from potential employers.
